data.body: Rishi Madhuchandaa Mantra on Indra recited in Gayatri meter.
प्रथमं मण्डलमं, अनु १, ३ सूक्तम् ऋषि मधुच्छन्दा वैश्वामित्रः छन्द: गायत्री इन्द्र देव
अश्विना यज्वरीरिषो द्रवत्पाणी शुभस्पती । पुरुभुजा चनस्यतम ॥
अश्विना पुरुदंससा नरा शवीरया धिया । धिष्ण्या वनतं गिरः ॥
दस्रा युवाकवः सुता नासत्या वृक्तबर्हिषः ।आ यातं रुद्रवर्तनी ॥
इन्द्रा याहि चित्रभानो सुता इमे त्वायवः । अण्वीभिस्तना पूतासः ॥
इन्द्रा याहि धियेषितो विप्रजूतः सुतावतः । उप ब्रह्माणि वाघतः ॥
इन्द्रा याहि तूतुजान उप ब्रह्माणि हरिवः । सुते दधिष्व नश्चनः ॥
ओमासश्चर्षणीधृतो विश्वे देवास आगत । दाश्वांसो दाशुषः सुतम ॥
विश्वे देवासो अप्तुरः सुतमा गन्त तूर्णयः । उस्रा इव स्वसराणि ॥
विश्वे देवासो अस्रिध एहिमायासो अद्रुहः ।मेधं जुषन्त वह्नयः ॥
पावका नः सरस्वती वाजेभिर्वाजिनीवती ।यज्ञं वष्टु धियावसुः ॥
चोदयित्री सूनृतानां चेतन्ती सुमतीनाम । यज्ञं दधे सरस्वती ॥
महो अर्णः सरस्वती प्र चेतयति केतुना । धियो विश्वा वि राजति ॥
Asvins carry on the sacrifice, enjoy it rich; Euphoric lords, their moves, so swift; The energies urge, Their delights lift.
Asvins, O leaders; Start the action; Firm, brilliant and intelligent, O advocates. My words, may they bring you satisfaction.
Your action, we wish. We prime the Potent Soma. O powers of speed, Take your seat; to our sacrifice, come swift; Pure turns matter, you help it proceed.

Come, O Indra, bequeathed you are in lights, So many of us return to this Soma wine; This index of wonder, desires a sip; Race to the Soma pleasant and benign. Beyond ordinary stretched, the Subtle powers entwine.
Thoughts, aggravated; Illumined scholars, their urge; Come to my chants, deliberated; come to this singer, this medicine-man’s church;
Indra, gallop on your steeds, with power; My praises beseech you; Grasp firm for us in Soma - this enchanted hour
Come here, all ye Gods; Fosterers - the pursuers, you endorse; In diligence, you apportion the Soma; Prepared by the giver, vital force
Ye gods, who pour the waters; To my Soma offering, hasten; Just the way the cows to their resting place, rush in
All ye Gods, we know, you don’t blunder; Harmless you are; Enjoy, uphold this sacrifice, free as knowledge, you travel far
Cathartic Sarasvati, you long for a sacrifice; Riches, there are, abundant; Festooned they are, by ornate thoughts; Will you espouse this sacrificial moment?
She stamps the moment; Stamps it with truth so propitious; All happy thoughts awaken; Sarasvati upholds the sacrifice
Avalanches led by Sarasvati; Truth is the great flood; Revelation felt in the consciousness; Illumined is the thought
